Sequence Information.Peptide Name: Nigrocin-2GRa (Nigrocin-OG20; Grahamin 2; Gly-rich; natural AMPs; frog, amphibians, animals; XXU; 1S=S, UCSS1a)
Sequence Information.Source: Rana grahami, Also skin,Odorrana grahami,  Asia

Literature Information.Literature: Active against E. coli (MIC 25 uM).  Also discovered byXu et al. (2006)from the same frog. Active against S. aureus (MIC 2.5 ug/ml), E. coli, B. dysenteriae (MIC 2.5-5 ug/ml), and C. albicans (MIC 7.5 ug/ml). Active against E.coli (MIC>100 uM), S. aureus (MIC 75 ug/ml), B. subtilis (MIC 9.4 ug/ml), and C. albicans (MIC 9.4 ug/ml) (Li et al., 2007).Found in multiple species. Updated 2/2020 GW.
Literature Information.Author: Conlon JM, Al-Ghaferi N, Abraham B, Jiansheng H, Cosette P, Leprince J, Jouenne T, Vaudry H.2006
Literature Information.Title: Antimicrobial peptides from diverse families isolated from the skin of the Asia frog, Rana Grahami
